description:
Creality Print is a self-developed Fused deposition modeling slicing software produced by Creality.

It's a practical and easy-to-use tool that can help you remote control and monitor your 3D printer and help print directly from your computer.
Features
- 1.Upgraded support algorithm to enhance support detachability and structural diversity.
- 2.Optimized calculation accuracy for Creality HI time estimation.
- 3.Improved slicing efficiency when enabling support.
- 4.Added Ctrl/Shift multi-select in object management tree.
- 5.Smoother multi-device switching in details page.
- 6.Optimized LAN stability, resolve device connection failures, transmission errors, empty device lists, and camera freezes.
Fixed
- 1.Fixed false alerts: "Preset/printer mismatch" and "Device self-checking".
- 2.Fixed 5.x presets import failure in 6.x.
- 3.Fixed printer name modification failure in lists.
- 4.Fixed firmware crash from special characters in files.
- 5.Fixed Error 2060 and coordinate anomalies in specific scenarios.
- 6.Fixed the wipe tower suspension issue when enabling non-sparse layers.
- 7.Fixed object exclusion errors with excessive models.
- 8.Fixed MacOS compatibility & UI issues.
